data.title: The penguins of Madagascar. The all nighter before Christmas
data.meta_description: The zoo is closed for Christmas eve and the Penguins are on a very merry mission to throw a Kids-mas celebration for the littlest zoosters. But when everything turns to chaos, Skipper realizes the only one who can help them is Santa. However, will they be able find him before time runs out? Includes three double-length episodes, plus three winter-themed episodes.
